meta.tagline: Web developer | Creative thinker | Solution creator | Change maker

basics.name: Iosif V.
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hey there I'm Iosif, a senior Software Engineer with experience in creating complete projects from start to finish in Node.js and PHP. I write code as clean as possible so that the next dev will be happy to maintain it and the junior will quickly grasp it. Curious by nature, I'm always willing to learn new things, so these days I spend my evenings working with Solidity and Hardhat on creating Blockchain smart contracts.

work.name: Casa4
work.summary: Contractor for various clients. Worked on diverse projects, specializing in PHP, Laravel, and Node.js. Involved both in team-based development and solo application building from design to deployment.
highlights: ElectroRent: Collaborated on a team of 20 developers on a complex tool-renting platform written in Laravel.
Aliat Optic: Designed and produced an invoicing app, integrating external FTP data via AWS Lambda and DynamoDB.
The Hurlingham Club: Managed system migration to internal servers, resolving a wide range of dependancy and dev-ops issues.
TicketTailor: Enhanced the API of a sophisticated PHP application with both bugfixes and new features.
↪ Technologies: Laravel, Node.js, AWS Lambda, MySQL, Terraform, AWS, VueJS, NuxtJS, CLI, Bash

work.name: Artetra
work.summary: Startup that works towards bringing NFT's into online virtual galleries.
highlights: I translate the business requirements project features.
Responsible with both the architecture and granular tasks. While managing a team of 3-4 developers I have to provide them with any assistance when they need it.
↪ Technologies: Node.js, Hardhat, Solidity, AWS

work.name: True Compliance
highlights: Worked on building the main API of the system. Contributed to all the adjacent applications which constituted the entire ecosystem deployed as serverless functions on AWS with Laravel Vapor. Involved in designing some parts of the ecosystem's architecture.

Some notable projects were a full reporting application which would create a report from any SQL provided. A system to serve real time data faster to the end client; by saving all the processed relational data into a no-sql database thus providing instant access to the transformed client-friendly set of the data.
↪ Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Laravel Vapor, AWS, VueJS, Node.js, Serverless Framework, CLI, Bash

work.name: Skin Analytics
work.summary: Designing and developing our main applications and keeping an eye on the AWS infrastructure.
highlights: Biggest task was a migration from a no-sql database to a relational database which resulted in a 11x speed increase. All this was achieved with 100% transparency to the end user.
↪ Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, AWS, Loopback, pm2, Angular

work.name: Woooba
highlights: Developed & maintained nationwide educational platforms. Designed and integrated various APIs.
We built a complete financial management application.
Managed all our DigitalOcean droplets with a CI setup.
↪ Technologies: Laravel, DigitalOcean, Laravel Forge, PHP, RESTful APIs, MySql, Git, CLI, VueJS, PhpUnit.

work.name: iQU Group
highlights: Created complete APIs from start to end as well as libraries which were used by my colleagues.
Another smaller project was built with Java and PipelineDB.
↪ Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Symfony, API, MySQL, Git, Docker, CLI, PhpUnit, AngularJS, Java

work.name: Project 89109
highlights: ↪ Technologies: PHP, API, MySQL, CLI, Git, JS, jQuery.

work.name: Hidden Hash (Personal Venture)
work.summary: Family business dealing with mining crypto-currencies.
highlights: Worked on Business model, Hardware setup, Software & security optimization/tweaks/updates, Performance fine tuning, Trading generated assets.
Learned a lot about managing a larger than usual number of computers and hardware components.
Built an open-source watchdog mechanism for certain types of graphic cards (https://github.com/iosifv/amd-vega-startup-scripts).

work.name: Saya Studio (Personal Venture)
work.summary: Photography studio focusing mainly on weddings.
highlights: Worked on Client handling, Marketing, Accounting, Management, Photographing, Retouching, Graphic design, Web-design.

projects.name: CLI Path
highlights: A simple CLI tool to search paths on google maps.
The intent is to use to quickly get the grasp of your commute time.
Built with the intent of using as many technologies as possible for learning purposes.
↪ Technologies: cli app, Serverless Framework, Monorepo, Auth0, OpenAPI, VHS

projects.name: Casa4 website
highlights: An overengineered personal website.
Built mostly for learning purposes.
↪ Technologies: Hugo, Terraform, Cloudfront, AWS, Github Actions

projects.name: Terminal ToolBelt
highlights: Open source collection of aliases and bash functions which I use.
Organised in something which resembles a CLI Framework.

projects.name: Silence
highlights: Open source tool for safely backing up ssh keys in a git repository

projects.name: iosifv.com
highlights: A copy of the repository of my website.
Backend management system written in Laravel. Includes a photo gallery, quotes collection and a really cool json generated CV.
